title: ICSC 2024
location: University of Music and Performing Arts, Vienna
description:
International Csound Conference
Session 16: Integrated Csound 2
Opening mind by opening architecture: analysis strategies

title: SIMC Festival - Autumn - IX concert
description:
SIMC Festival - Autumn - IX concert.
Commissioned piece: Lumina (2024) for fixed media.
Organized by SIMC (Società Italiana Musica Contemporanea)

title: IHM - ArteScienza 2025
description:
ArteScienza 2025.
Commissioned piece: IHM (2025) concert-opera for four cellos and one electroacoustic player.
Musicians: Roberta Pastore, Donatello Notarnicola, Emanuela Storelli, Fedora Palladino, Daniele Giuseppe Annese, Francesco Vitucci

title: IMPULSE Tour (1)
location: Instituto Nacional de la Música, Costa Rica
description:
Percussionist Niccolò Fino's Tour.
Commissioned piece: (ec)stasis (2024) for for marimba, vibraphone, multi-percussion and live electronics.
Produced in collaboration with AltreMenti Labs and supported by the Centro Nacional de la Música, Instituto Nacional de la Música, Universidad de las Artes de Yucatàn, and the 2024 Tour Export program by Puglia Sounds.
